title: Guardians of health and welfare
creator_credit: Rupert Charlett, Dennis Trewin, Ronald Mason and Academy Film Productions
brief_description: Indicates many professions and occupations associated with public health and social welfare. Reviews the qualifications and training required for carers in the field. From the ‘Way to tomorrow” series.
